1029750.name: Voipas
1029750.description:
Voipas is a virtual assistant for PC. The new version includes a chat feature. You can interact with your friends through gestures, not only text. You can add only 7 friends, your true friends. Because who can keep up with more ? This is not a social app where you can have thousand of friends who you probably never talked to.
There is a mobile version for android. The changes you make on PC or phone would reflect on the other device, except some basic data.
The NPC can give you an advice when you feel down, cheer you, give you a virtual kiss or remind you to study for exams. You can own a dog and pet him whenever you want.
For now, the overlap effect is not constant in time. (fixed in v0.93)
Over 50 phrases including:
-How was your day at work?
-How was your day at school?
-Did you study for your exam? It's better to begin studying earlier.
-Don't forget to study for your exam.
-Good luck with the exam.
-It's late, I think you should go to sleep.
-It's so late, you better go to sleep.

You can leave us a message here or on our website with your suggestions.
1029750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
